name: Advertising
description: The industry involved in creating, planning, and executing marketing and promotional campaigns to communicate messages and promote products, services, or brands to target audiences.

name: Aerospace
description: The industry that encompasses the research, development, manufacturing, and maintenance of aircraft, spacecraft, satellites, and related components and systems.

name: Agriculture and Farming
description: The industry involved in the cultivation of crops, raising livestock, and other agricultural activities to produce food, fiber, and other natural resources.

name: Animal Health
description: This industry is primarily focused on the health, well-being, and medical care of animals.

name: This industry is primarily focused on the health, well-being, and medical care of animals.
description: The industry focused on the design, development, manufacturing, and sale of automobiles, including cars, trucks, motorcycles, and their components.

name: Banking and Finance
description: The industry that provides financial services such as banking, lending, investment management, insurance, and other related activities to individuals, businesses, and governments.

name: Catering
description: The industry involved in providing food services for events, parties, conferences, and other gatherings, including food preparation, delivery, and event catering.

name: Chemicals
description: The industry involved in the production, manufacturing, and distribution of chemicals, including industrial chemicals, specialty chemicals, and petrochemicals.

name: Construction and Engineering
description: The industry that encompasses the planning, design, construction, and maintenance of buildings, infrastructure, and other physical structures.

name: Consumer Goods and Retail
description: The industry involved in the production, distribution, and sale of goods and services directly to consumers, including various retail sectors such as clothing, electronics, food, and household items.

name: Education and Training
description: The industry focused on providing educational services, including schools, colleges, universities, training centers, e-learning platforms, and educational technologies.

name: Energy and Utilities
description: The industry that encompasses the generation, distribution, and supply of energy resources such as electricity, natural gas, oil, and renewable energy sources.

name: Entertainment and Media
description: The industry involved in the creation, production, distribution, and consumption of entertainment content, including film, television, music, publishing, gaming, and digital media.

name: Food and Beverage
description: The industry involved in the production, processing, packaging, distribution, and sale of food and beverages, including agriculture, food manufacturing, restaurants, and food retail.

name: Gaming and Interactive Entertainment
description: The industry involved in the creation, development, and distribution of video games, interactive entertainment software, and gaming hardware.

name: Government and Public Administration
description: Government and Public Administration: The industry that encompasses government organisations, agencies, and public administration, responsible for governing, policymaking, and providing public services.

name: Healthcare and Pharmaceuticals
description: The industry focused on providing medical services, healthcare products, and pharmaceuticals, including hospitals, clinics, pharmaceutical companies, medical devices, and research organisations.

name: Hospitality and Tourism
description: The industry involved in providing services and accommodations to travelers, including hotels, resorts, restaurants, travel agencies, and tourism-related activities.

name: Information Technology and Services
description: The industry that deals with the development, implementation, and management of information systems, software solutions, IT consulting, and related services.

name: Insurance
description: The industry involved in providing risk management and financial protection through insurance policies, including life insurance, health insurance, property insurance, and more.

name: Manufacturing and Industrial
description: The industry involved in the production, assembly, and fabrication of goods and products using various industrial processes and technologies.

name: Mining and Extraction
description: The industry involved in the extraction, processing, and refinement of minerals, metals, and natural resources from the Earth's crust.

name: Nonprofit and Philanthropy
description: The industry focused on charitable and humanitarian activities, working towards social causes, providing services, and supporting communities without a profit motive.

name: Oil & Gas
description: The industry involved in the exploration, extraction, refining, and distribution of oil and natural gas resources.

name: Professional Services (e.g., consulting, legal, accounting)
description: This industry includes various professional services such as consulting, legal services, accounting, auditing, and other specialised professional services.

name: Real Estate and Property
description: The industry involved in the development, sale, purchase, and management of real estate properties, including residential, commercial, and industrial properties.

name: Renewable Energy
description: The industry focused on the production and utilisation of energy generated from renewable sources such as solar, wind, hydro, biomass, and geothermal energy.

name: Sports and Recreation
description: The industry involved in providing sports-related services, facilities, equipment, and recreational activities for individuals and communities, including sports clubs, fitness centers, and sports entertainment.

name: Telecommunications
description: The industry involved in providing communication services, including telephone networks, internet services, wireless communication, and related technologies.

name: Transportation and Logistics
description: The industry involved in the movement and transportation of goods, products, and people, including transportation services, logistics management, shipping, and freight.

name: Travel and Aviation
description: The industry involved in providing travel-related services, including airlines, travel agencies, tour operators, and other travel and aviation-related activities.

name: Waste Management and Environmental Services
description: The industry involved in the collection, treatment, disposal, and recycling of waste materials, as well as environmental consulting and sustainability services.

name: Wellness
description: The wellness industry focuses on promoting and improving individuals' overall well-being, encompassing physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual health.
